charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) &; (b)(1)(C) POSSESSION OF COCAINE BASE WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE(1)

charges.charge_disposition: IMPRISONMENT for a total term of 92 months as to Count 1; 92 months as to Count 2; terms are to run concurrently with each other; for a total term of 92 months.
